title: Till All My People Are One
lyrics:
Stand together
For what you believe
Work for what must be done,
Love each other
In all that you do,
Till all my people are one.

Spread the peace, my brothers,
Spread it ev'rywhere,
Make the world know
Right from wrong
Help the world to care.

Cry out the sound of freedom,
Make ev'ry sound be heard,
People crying painfully,
Hear their ev'ry word.

Open your hearts, my brothers,
Lend a willing hand;
Show the lonely and the poor
That God is in our land

Sing out the joy of living;
Sing your song on high;
The truth of mankind is that
He was born to live, not die.

Know that He is with us
In everything we do;
Tho' hard times may lie ahead,
Peace will follow through.
